item.description:
#include <stdio.h>

int Frm()
{
    char ch, zn;
    int a, b, r;
    ch = getchar();

    if (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
        return ch - 48;

    a = Frm();
    zn = getchar();
    b = Frm();
    switch (zn)
    {
    case '+':
        r = a + b;
        break;
    case '-':
        r = a - b;
        break;
    case '*':
        r = a * b;
        break;
    }
    ch = getchar();
    return r;
}

int main()
{
    printf("%d\n", Frm());
    return 0;
}

item.title: C
item.description:
#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
#pragma warning(disable:4996)
using namespace std;

int pos;

char buff[1001];

bool Frm()
{
    char ch = buff[pos];
    int a, b, r;

    if (ch == 't')
    {
        pos += 4;
        return true;
    }
    if (ch == 'f')
    {
        pos += 5;
        return false;
    }

    ++pos; // Пропустили скобку.

    if (buff[pos] == '!')
    {
        ++pos;
        r = !Frm();
        ++pos;
        return r;
    }

    a = Frm();
    char zn = buff[pos];
    ++pos;
    b = Frm();
    switch (zn)
    {
    case '&':
        r = a && b;
        break;
    case 'V':
        r = a || b;
        break;
    }

    ++pos; // Пропустили закрывающую скобку.

    return r;
}

int main()
{
    while (gets(buff) != nullptr)
    {
        pos = 0;
        printf(Frm() ? "true\n" : "false\n");
    }
    return 0;
}

#include <stdio.h>
#include <algorithm>
#include <string>
#include <iostream>
#pragma warning(disable:4996)

using namespace std;

bool check()
{
    int ch = getchar();
    if (ch >= '0' && ch <= '9')
        return true;
    if (ch == '(')
    {
        bool a = check();
        ch = getchar();
        bool b = check();
        bool c = ch == '+' || ch == '-' || ch == '*';
        if (!a || !b || !c)
            return false;
        getchar();
        return true;
    }
    return false;
}

int main()
{
    bool r = check();
    string str;
    getline(cin, str);
    if (str != "." || !r)
        cout << "No" << endl;
    else
        cout << "Yes" << endl;

    return 0;
}
